description.@en: Raise your cups, for tonight we either dine in hell, or we revel with Bacchus!

effect.@en: When you are Intoxicated, will you be a merry drunk or a moody drunk? When you’re merry, gain a +10% Base Chance to Coordination Tests while Intoxicated. When you’re moody, gain a +10% Base Chance to Athletics Tests while Intoxicated. You can make this choice every time you become Intoxicated.
